page.title: 14Filey Amateur Dramatics.
page.content: Filey Amateur Variety Association was formed in 1975 by a local family. Approximately 20 children take part,singing and dancing in a variety show each Monday and Tuesday through- out the Summer.The local Vicar, a member of the magic circle,takes part and six other adults provide the comedy. All the proceeds go to local children's charites,so the children taking part are helping children less fortunate than themselves.Over the ten years the association has been in existence over Â£10,000 has been raised.
